p: The world faces a global health-care crisis of unheralded magnitude. The rate of infection and mortality from COVID-19 make it unlike any virus seen in this century. Physicians and scientists are banding together to combat the threat of SAR-CoV-2. Tissue engineers have a rare set of tools and can make substantial contributions to our understanding of viral disease and contribute toward the critical development of diagnostic and therapeutic platforms. Together, we can overcome this current pandemic and work to prevent and mitigate future viral outbreaks.
